Module rrpss
Package order

Class OrderPromotionPackage

java.lang.Object
menu.PromotionPackage
order.OrderPromotionPackage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderPromotionPackage extends PromotionPackage
This is an extention of promotion package, which includes the quantity ordered, as well as its price multiplied by the quantity
Author:
Trevor

    • OrderPromotionPackage

      public OrderPromotionPackage​(int packageId, String packageName, double packagePrice, String packageDescription, ArrayList<MenuItem> listOfMenuItem, int qty)
      Creates the promotion package item line with the quantity ordered
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the promotion package ordered
      packageName - The name of the promotion package ordered
      packagePrice - The individual price of the promotion package ordered
      packageDescription - The description of the promotion package ordered
      listOfMenuItem - The list of menu items that the promotion package contains
      qty - The quantity of the promotion package ordered
